item.title: India will receive the India Inclusive Innovation Fund
item.description:
The Indian Cabinet has approved a proposal from the Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME) to establish a dedicated fund. This fund will focus on promoting grassroots innovations that generate social benefits alongside reasonable economic returns. Union Minister Shri Kalraj Mishra shared this information in a written response to a question in Lok Sabha. The fund, named “India Inclusive Innovation Fund,” aims to support businesses developing solutions for citizens at the lower end of India’s economic spectrum...

item.title: Helping individuals with disabilities transition from training programs to meaningful employment opportunities
item.description:
Individuals with disabilities should be placed in jobs where they can acquire skills on the job, rather than receiving training without a clear path to employment. Christy Lynch, CEO of KARE Ireland, an organization supporting individuals with intellectual disabilities and their families, emphasized the importance of collaborating with both individuals with disabilities and employers to create truly empowering opportunities. He spoke at the “Towards an Inclusive Workforce 2015” event, co-organized by SPD and supported by SG Enable and the Singapore Workforce Development Agency (WDA)...
